displayName.japanese: 敵のキャプチャーに成功＜Gダライアスver.1＞

description.english: Capture an enemy that's not a miniboss. Quick Load allowed. Options modifications allowed. 2-Player co-op allowed. Continues allowed. No difficulty level specified.Only available in G Darius Ver.1.
